Question: This person released the program on VHS in early 1994 as This person's New Year's Rotten Eve 1994.
Hints: Cuomo was defeated in the gubernatorial election on November 8 by George Pataki, who this person backed.
On September 30, 1985, this person and Quivers were fired for what management termed "conceptual differences" regarding the show.
A settlement was reached in 1999 with this person receiving $50,000.
